x = "the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog"
x.find("fox")
x[16:]

'fox jumped over the lazy dog'
x[16:19]

'fox'
x[0:19]

'the quick brown fox'
x[:19]

'the quick brown fox'
x[:]

'the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog'
x[::1]

'the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog'
x[16::-1]

'f nworb kciuq eht'
